title: refactor(http-server): inline single-use is_ipv6_address function
body:
## Description

Single-use static function `is_ipv6_address()` at lines 261-266 in `src/http/SocketHTTPServer.c`.

## Location

- **File**: `src/http/SocketHTTPServer.c`
- **Lines**: 261-266
- **Function**: `is_ipv6_address`

## Current Code

```c
static int
is_ipv6_address (const char *addr)
{
  struct in6_addr dummy;
  return inet_pton (AF_INET6, addr, &dummy) == 1;
}
```

## Analysis

- **Size**: 5 lines
- **Called**: Once (at line 289)
- **Pattern**: SINGLE_USE_INLINE

## Recommendation

Inline this trivial 5-line function at its single call site in `SocketHTTPServer_start()`.

## Severity

HIGH (inline candidate - <30 lines)
